itemDisplayName: Deploys a SQL Server 2014 Always On AG using DSC
description:
This template creates five new Azure VMs, with a public IP address, NAT'd RDP port, external and internal load balancer and VNet, it configures two VMs to be AD DCs for a new Forest and Domain, and creates a Windows
	cluster with the other three VMs, two VMs in the cluster are running SQL Server 2014 with an availability group and a listener, the other VM is a File Shre Witness for the cluster
summary: This template creates 5 Azure VMs with AD and SQL Server Always On
